REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1959 reute d f BC-U.S.-HEALTHCARE-<USHC 04-09 0043

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. HEALTHCARE <USHC> TO RUN HMO IN DELAWARE
TEXT.BODY: U.S. Healthcare Inc said it has been granted a certificate of authority to operate a health maintenance organization in Delaware by the Delaware Department of Health and Social Services. Reuter
